document_data.name: And So They Met the Gargoyle
document_data.author: [[Zarghar]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''And So They Met the Gargoyle''''' was a type of stage performance called "grand play", popularized in [[Athkatla]] of [[Amn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century DR, ''And So They Met the Gargoyle'' was considered a classic. The performance was penned by [[Zarghar]], Playwright of Athkatla. The "grand play" was in the repertoire of the famous [[The Crown Aflame]] theater in Athkatla's [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]].
